AI Description: R Bioconductor is a collection of R packages for the analysis and comprehension of high-throughput genomic data. It provides tools for the analysis of genomics, proteomics, metabolomics, and other high-throughput biology data.
Core Features: Analysis Of High-Throughput Genomic Data, Tools For Genomics, Proteomics, & Metabolomics, Data Visualization & Interpretation, Statistical Analysis For Biological Data
General Tags: R, Bioconductor, Genomics, Proteomics, Metabolomics, Data Analysis
